condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 5.1. Number of survival businesses strengthened in Bogota´s localities 5.2. Number of investment plans in Bogota´s localities 5.3. Number of capitalized survival businesses in Bogota´s localities 5.4. Number of commercial businesses that participates in events carried out to promote sales of products of Bogota´s localities

comment.narrative: - Two Responsible Party Agreements signed - 4379 companies selected for “Impulso Local” strategy (survival business) - 1937 micro-enterprises selected for “Microempresa Local” strategy

- Two Responsible Parties Agreements were signed, first was with Fundación Capital on August 30, 2021, and with Propais and it was signed September 28 for the implementation of the “Microempresa Local” initiative - 4,379 companies (100%) were selected under Impulso Local initiative - 645 beneficiary companies of the “Microempresa Local” initiative (33%) have been selected. The implementation of both programs initiates on October 19, 2021.

4.387 survival businesses strengthened in Bogota´s localities 4.387 investment plans in Bogota´s localities 4.387 of capitalized survival businesses in Bogota´s localities 960 commercial businesses that participates in events carried out to promote sales of products of Bogota´s localities
